pages.text: $(#ffa500)$(l)Quark$(reset) adds a bit functionality to your inventory. Do you see those little buttons when you open any inventory? Those allow you to sort items, move them from or into your inventory (even filtered to match already stored ones), and search for specific item if inventory is huge!

You can also sort any inventory with just one click. Press $(l)$(k:quark.keybind.sort_container)$() to $(l)sort any inventory$(reset) youâ€™re currently navigating, or $(l)$(k:quark.keybind.sort_player)$() to sort your inventory!
